title: Mastering Prompt Frameworks for Business Efficiency

Streamlined examples focus on a few key exercises for deep exploration, with simplified language for clarity. Aligns with course objectives by offering focused, real-world exercises that enhance productivity and precision in AI interactions. Feasible with an approximate 4-hour allocation for theory and interactive exercises, assuming tight session management.
